trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Broken Arrow
There were no other sightings in Broken Arrow on or around September 23rd 2012
Summary: On Sept 23 2012 at 5:30am, a V shaped object with bright lights, appeared in the north sky traveling slow over the tree tops and disapearing in the eastern sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsI could not sleep so I made coffee at 5am and went out on my front porch to drink it. I had been out there about 30 min. when I saw a V shaped object traveling very slow and just above the tree tops, moving from north to east in a straight line. I walked out on to the lawn and watched it until I could not see it any longer. I don't know if it shot off, or went invisible. I just could'nt see it. It was gone. I felt very scared and I went back to the porch sat down and started to pray. I then felt some type of liquid hit my forhead. When I reached up and touched the spot it felt sticky. I went inside and looked in the mirror and it looked like blood. This is the second time I've seen a UFO. The first time I didn't report it. I should have because it was very eventful, I was too afraid of what people would think back then.
